item.title: Installing Spotify Linux beta on OpenSUSE 13.1
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Very small post (more like insruction for myself for the future) on how to convert deb packages provided by Spotify to rpm. Solution can be applied to any rpm based system (I think so).
